snippet: Ted Kennedy Jr., son of the late Democratic senator from Massachusetts, Edward Kennedy, announced on Tuesday that he would run for a seat in the Connecticut state senate, his first run for political office....

headline.print_headline: Ted Kennedy Jr. Announces Run for Connecticut State Senate Seat
headline.main: Ted Kennedy Jr. Announces Run for Connecticut State Senate Seat

lead_paragraph: Ted Kennedy Jr., son of the late Democratic senator from Massachusetts, Edward Kennedy, announced on Tuesday that he would run for a seat in the Connecticut state senate, his first run for political office.
